short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A 1-click utility to easily request a more modern paywall to publishers that still rely on the outdated subscription-only model.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Media consumers only have subscriptions a mean to legally access content.
Paperview is a system that publishers can adopt to make content available as different products, like single articles purchases, or bundles like the sports section sold as one.
This plugin allows visitors to contact the publications' editors and suggest that they adopt Paperview to provide less expensive ways for readers to purchase content.
